data.message: Thanks FB for this memorable journey back in just recent time. I'm touched; really.

replies.message: You're very welcome, Jean. We're happy to hear you enjoyed it! -Kate
Thanks Facebook, our group has had problems keeping info moving, it seems as if that problem is  disappearing by using Facebook. Thanks!
